messages.message:
Hi @Serena 
1. It's a build app.
2. Yes
What is the actual correct order of the items in the document? Can you provide the sample document?
The correct order is under the "Ground Truth" column

we should try to sort all values in the list according to the order of the words in the document

can you provide the document used here so that we can try to reproduce?

looking at this document, i don’t understand why the correct order should be [“Reception”, “Guest Service”, “N/A”, “Front Office”, “Customer Service”, “Front Desk”]

the skills listed are [“Guest Service”,“Front Office”,“Customer Service”,“Front Desk”,“Reception”]
Hi, correct order is needed for the accuracy calculation here. But there can be some business use cases in future which might need the exact order from the documents.

I can also see use cases where order matters. @Serena wondering if it would make sense to have a setting where where a user can specify for lists to either be exact matched (order persisted) or fuzzy match (order doesn't matter). Same as the other configurations that we support
